format: A data frame with 1594 observations on the following 8 variables.
reference:
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(LAhomes, aes(sqft, price)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Can we predict list price from squarefootage?",
    subtitle = "Homes in the Los Angeles area",
    x = "Square feet",
    y = "List price"
  )
title: LAhomes
description:
Description
Data collected by Andrew Bray at Reed College on characteristics of LA Homes in 2010.

parameters.bed: Number of bedrooms in the home.
parameters.type: Type of home with levels Condo/Twh - condo or townhouse, SFR - single family residence, and NA
parameters.bath: Number of bathrooms in the home.
parameters.city: City where the home is located.
parameters.pool: Indicates if the home has a pool.
parameters.garage: Number of cars that can be parked in the garage. Note that a value of 4 refers to 4 or more garage spaces.
